title: Editbar
author: Editbar
content: This is important especially at this point in the market because we are so low already with the prices of cryptocurrencies however the old saying is if we go down 80 nothing is stopping us from going down another 80 so we want to identify the best times to be buying altcoins for those longer-term swing trades my vision and opinion with cryptocurrencies is that there's still only a handful that is worth holding for a longer period but the vast majority of them should 100 be dumped as soon as possible to take those profits this has been my position throughout the entire 2021 bull market I was hated for it at the tops of the market but I guess now in the bear market everyone can see I went through it in 2017 I held the coins to the Lowe's reposition my portfolio made sure I got out of it so that I could be fresh for the next bull market and I think we're starting to fall into that period now however the good news is we still have a fair bit of time even if we see a little Bounce from this area that we're in maybe the little bounce feels huge maybe.

comments.author: dimonstration
comments.body: This will be an interesting story if you can provide proof to all your claims such as screenshot of your buy and sell history to backed up your story. There is a lot of user here claiming this kind of success story without proof while getting the timing on when to buy and sell properly is still the biggest question here in the forum.Old coin should be evaluated first before anyone buy back again on it because some old coins is already stagnant with low trading volume. These are dead projects that just slowly abandoning the project. Buying these tokens is a trap. But most of the old coins with good trading volume can be bought near the all time low since the current market condition is already approaching towards it.

comments.author: Yatsan
comments.body: Depends on the coin you are planning to invest your money with. Not all Old coins have the potential; there might be a reason why it became old with a low market price (assuming that it is 'coz you are planning to invest into it), unless it is like Bitcoin and others. Check for market volume, demand and its popularity still or utility and check if it still has 'life'. There's no such thing as perfect time. Analyze and make a move whether to engage on a particular coin or not. But based on experience, those coins which are left behind by time, are having slightest chance to come back especially if it did not make an impact on its prime.

comments.body: Hope you recall not all old coins ever survived bear market some crashed for ever. For now Bitcoin is the most reliable and to time when to buy is simply buying where you met the price if it pumps take profit and what to buy lower again because no one can emphatically say where the next bear or bull price will hit

comments.author: dothebeats
comments.body: There are tons of old coins that are in the market which are still available for the taking. It highly depends on the volume and market dynamics of the coin if it will make or break. A lot of them crashed heavily in the previous years and most are beyond recovery at this point. Though there are some that are still experiencing some pumps and dumps, but it's always safe to just invest on coins that are still active in the market than risking on old coins which has no activity or updates whatsoever.

comments.author: abel1337
comments.body: It is proven that not all old coins has a chance to rise on the next bull run. I've also been on the 2017 bull market and the bear market that happened on 2018. Sadly I have a few coins that time that I kept and hoping to rise on the last bull market but nahh it fell to the ground and never survived the bear market. There are just very few who make it and those are some top notch quality project just like ethereum. This bear market, my personal strategy is to find new born altcoins who were created during the bear market since most of the top rising altcoins on last bull market is the coins that were born during the bear market.

comments.author: Lagduf
comments.body: Buy now or regret it later. It's hard to determine how bottom the altcoins will go. What you can do yo make sure if you are buying at the bottom price like this time. The global crisis is still happening and there will be more and more discount to the all of cryptos. The old coins have become the hottest investment this time, it can be seen from how many investors are putting their money to buy old coins.

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: I think you should follow the lowest value of a coin in the last 2 years. I believe that everyone can go to that line, but also (my opinion) that it is their lowest limit.of course, we are talking about coins that have some kind of real support, not one-season trash.I also won't be surprised if this bear period lasts for a long time, so somehow I'm not worried myself, there will still be time for a potential entry into altcoins.

comments.author: samcrypto
comments.body: If that old coin/token is no longer active, with a small volume and not existed on many exchange I suggest not to deal with it anymore and just choose the old coin that are still part of the top 20 coins, BTC is the best option above all but other Altcoins are good as well. To know when is the best time to buy, you have to do your technical analysis and understand the movement of the chart, it can tell you when is a good time to timing the trend. TA works, so don’t forget to do this every time you trade or invest.

comments.author: Jaered
comments.body: There is no good or perfect time to buy or interact with 'old coins'. This is because even though we are riding a bearish trend, no one knows when that much awaited bullish market to pop in, and take everyone by surprise. So just do it

comments.author: Jackl87
comments.body: Quote from: Editbar on October 10, 2022, 02:11:05 PMThis is important especially at this point in the market because we are so low already with the prices of cryptocurrencies however the old saying is if we go down 80 nothing is stopping us from going down another 80 so we want to identify the best times to be buying altcoins for those longer-term swing trades.I always have a hard time to buy Ethereum for 4000$ for example when i know that lot of people have bought it for below 1000$ a few years ago. That is the reason why for me a bear market, even though i hate that we are in a bear market at the moment because my portfolio worth is almost 0 now, is always a good chance to buy into projects that are already big and established.I personally have bought Cosmos (Atom) a few weeks ago for around 10$ per coin. I could have gotten it for 6$ also a few months before but then i was to unsure if we would not totally crash because that was when the Terra hack happened. That being said i am still happy with my buy because it is almost impossible to hit the perfect time. If you hodl enough i think you can do nothing wrong if you buy now.
